p: Protein (58.32%) was positively correlated with axis 3 ( Fig. 5). The species with high content of protein were Ficus glumosa, Maerua angolensis, Vitex doniana, Albizia glaberrima, Vernonia amygdalina, Pterocarpus santalinoides, Blighia unijugata, Gongronema latifolium, Pterocarpus mildbraedii and Telfairia occidentalis ( Appendix 4, Fig. 6).
